topics.body: Okay, Jack may be a jerk but he has a point. The only thing the Signers have in common is that they're Signers. They haven't shown any interest into getting to know and understand each other. He knows if that shit doesn't change they'll have NO CHANCE against the Dark Signers. They need to trust each other to work as a cohesive unit.

topics.body:
"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553c530563687223345e0000#post_553c530563687223345e0000
You know what?  It could probably be the best mod out there if everything else on the unused axis is invisible indestructible blocks and also it would drastically reduce lag.  So like the x and y axis you can only travel and the z axis you legitimately can not move into cause it's invisible bedrock.

Why would it reduce lag?  Easy the more complex machinery or blocks there are in minecraft the more lag there is.  Even if you have a absolute shit computer if you plugged in the mod with say direwolf 20 modpack since you're only using things along one plane everything is distributed greatly.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body: Okay, I kind of have a problem with Aki. It's a minor gripe at best though. This is a world in which magic bullshit happens all the time. And apparently her powers are to "monstrous" for everyone. Hell she went to a fucking DUEL ACADEMY. Was there no one who saw her powers and thought they were cool?! It's the same problem I have with stories like Carrie. Let's be real here. If a girl showed that she could move shit with her mind there'd be at least one dude thinking "That's FUCKING awesome! I am gonna make her my friend!"
